General.Name: Teuton Resources Corp.
General.Description: Teuton Resources Corp., an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition, exploration, and optioning of mineral properties in the province of British Columbia, Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, copper, lead, and zinc deposits. It holds interests in various properties located in the Skeena Mining Division, British Columbia; and the Roman Property in New Westminster Mining Division, British Columbia. Teuton Resources Corp. was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Victoria, Canada.
General.Address: 2130 Crescent Road, Victoria, BC, Canada, V8S 2H3
